name: part_014
file: tmp_【3Dライブ】重大発表!？何やらゲストも参戦してくれるらしい…⚡【#おかゆ重大発表 ⧸ ホロライブ】 [LazLAQUMCzI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_014.mov

scenes.description: Nekomata Okayu gives her final closing remarks and tells the audience to look forward to more news.
Promotional trailer for Nekomata Okayu's 1st Solo Live 'Poisonya Syndrome' and her 1st album.
Teaser section with silhouettes of guests and a 'Major Announcement!?' message.

subtitles.original: これからもどんどんビッグニュースが発表される予定なので、
subtitles.english: More and more big news is scheduled to be announced from now on,

subtitles.original: 楽しみに待っててね！
subtitles.english: so please look forward to it!

subtitles.original: 以上、猫又おかゆでした！
subtitles.english: That's all from Nekomata Okayu!

subtitles.original: バイバーイ！
subtitles.english: Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: 香りまとわせ　思うがままに
subtitles.english: Wrapped in scent, just as I please

subtitles.original: この身体のどこかに　生まれ持っていたなら
subtitles.english: If I was born with it somewhere in this body

subtitles.original: 何ものにも食せぬ　毒毒毒
subtitles.english: Something that can't be eaten by anything, poison poison poison

subtitles.original: うたうような甘さと　嗅ぎ回られもしようが
subtitles.english: With a singing sweetness, even if I'm sniffed around

subtitles.original: 喉から手が出るほど　毒毒毒
subtitles.english: So much that I'm dying for it, poison poison poison

subtitles.original: 気高く立って　じっとしていられるのなら
subtitles.english: If you can stand tall and stay still

subtitles.original: のぞむかい
subtitles.english: do you want it?

subtitles.original: Swallow, swallow, その唇で
subtitles.english: Swallow, swallow, with those lips

subtitles.original: 猫又おかゆ 初のワンマンライブ 開催決定！
subtitles.english: Nekomata Okayu's first solo live concert confirmed!

subtitles.original: 深く患った病を　求めついばむ
subtitles.english: Seeking and pecking at a deeply-seated illness

subtitles.original: 2022.9.30(Fri) TACHIKAWA STAGE GARDEN
subtitles.english: September 30, 2022 (Fri) at Tachikawa Stage Garden

subtitles.original: 願うまま　今をこなせればと
subtitles.english: Hoping to just make it through the now

subtitles.original: 現地チケット1次先行(抽選)受付開始！
subtitles.english: In-person ticket 1st lottery pre-sale begins!

subtitles.original: 乱れかかる喉を鳴らす
subtitles.english: Purring with a disheveled throat

subtitles.original: 詳細は特設HPをチェック
subtitles.english: Check the special website for details

subtitles.original: 何食わぬ顔さえ
subtitles.english: Even with a nonchalant face

subtitles.original: こっそり牙を宿していたい
subtitles.english: I want to keep my fangs hidden

subtitles.original: かじりつき　平らげて
subtitles.english: Bite into it, eat it all up

subtitles.original: 猫又おかゆ 1stアルバム「ぽいずにゃ〜しんどろーむ」
subtitles.english: Nekomata Okayu 1st Album "Poisonya Syndrome"

subtitles.original: 2022.9.6 Release
subtitles.english: Released on September 6, 2022

subtitles.original: 重大発表!?
subtitles.english: Major announcement!?
